Title: NEPC targets $3.7b annual revenue, trains youths for global outsourcing market
Summary: NEPC targets $3.7b annual revenue, trains youths for global outsourcing market . NEPC says it is targeting about 3.7 billion dollars in annual revenue by training and empowering Nigerian youths .

Title: Nigeria among Africa’s most over-taxed aviation jurisdictions – Okonkwo
Summary: Obiora Okonkwo says Nigeria is one of the most over-taxed aviation jurisdictions on the continent . He says the situation continues to drive up ticket prices and distort competition in West Africa’s airspace .

Title: Genocide: Nigeria home to most Christians in Africa, 4th worldwide, says report
Summary: Nigeria has the largest Christian population in Africa and the fourth largest in the world, according to new data compiled by Statisense using figures from the CIA World Factbook, Pew Research, and the United Nations World Population Prospects .

Title: INEC confirms unrecorded results in six LGAs, says outcome remains unaffected
Summary: INEC confirms unrecorded results in six LGAs, says outcome remains unaffected . Results from some polling units in six local government areas of Anambra State were not recorded .

Title: Booth Party candidate demands sanctions for vote buyers, seeks disqualification of offending parties
Summary: Booth Party governorship candidate Okeke Chika Jerry has urged INEC to prosecute those involved in vote buying and disqualify political parties found complicit in the practice . Booth Party candidate demands sanctions for vote buyers, seeks disqualification of offending parties .

Title: Top 10 countries with the most government debt in 2025
Summary: As of 2025, government debt continues to serve as a key measure of countries' fiscal health, reflecting spending priorities, borrowing strategies, and economic management . The Top 10 countries with the most government debt in 2025 .

Title: Rehab: I want Regina Daniels alive, healthy to raise her children— Ned Nwoko
Summary: Sen. Ned Nwoko said his wife Regina Daniels must go through rehabilitation for drug reasons . He stated this in an interview with the News Agency of Nigeria (NAN) on Sunday in Abuja . He said his stance was that she must be in the right mind to raise her children .

Title: APC chieftain seeks Nigerians’ support for Tinubu to address insecurity
Summary: Oyintiloye further stated that the current security situation did not begin with Tinubu’s administration but rather developed over a long period of time .

Title: NDLEA arrests Saudi-bound wanted drug kingpin, storms his Lagos colos lab
Summary: NDLEA arrests Saudi-bound wanted drug kingpin, storms his Lagos colos lab . Babafemi said the kingpin had been arrested and charged for drug offences in the United Kingdom, but jumped bail and escaped .

Title: Gov. Idris donates N150m to victims of herders, farmers conflict
Summary: Gov. Nasir Idris of Kebbi has donated N150 million to victims of recent clashes between pastoralists and farmers . The clashes occurred in the Arewa Local Government Area (LGA) of the state .
